languages.text: {n}Сквозь боль вы видите, как Паскаль воздевает руку, отдавая приказ столпившимся позади техножрецам, и сам впивается в клавиши когитатора, выбивая по ним боевой марш.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Сквозь боль вы видите, как Паскаль воздевает руку, отдавая приказ столпившимся позади техножрецам, и сам впивается в клавиши когитатора, выбивая по ним боевой марш.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Through the pain, you see Pasqal raise his hand, signalling the Tech-Priests behind him, and start drumming a battle march on the cogitator's keys.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Сквозь боль вы видите, как Паскаль воздевает руку, отдавая приказ столпившимся позади техножрецам, и сам впивается в клавиши когитатора, выбивая по ним боевой марш.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Through the pain, you see Pasqal raise his hand, signalling the Tech-Priests behind him, and start drumming a battle march on the cogitator's keys.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Through the pain, you see Pasqal raise his hand, signalling the Tech-Priests behind him, and start drumming a battle march on the cogitator's keys.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Through the pain, you see Pasqal raise his hand, signalling the Tech-Priests behind him, and start drumming a battle march on the cogitator's keys.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Through the pain, you see Pasqal raise his hand, signalling the Tech-Priests behind him, and start drumming a battle march on the cogitator's keys.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Through the pain, you see Pasqal raise his hand, signalling the Tech-Priests behind him, and start drumming a battle march on the cogitator's keys.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}痛みの中、あなたはパスカルが手を上げて後ろにいる技術司祭に合図を出し、考算機のキーで戦争行進曲をドラムのように叩き始めるのを見た。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Through the pain, you see Pasqal raise his hand, signalling the Tech-Priests behind him, and start drumming a battle march on the cogitator's keys.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}痛みの中、あなたはパスカルが手を上げて後ろにいる技術司祭に合図を出し、考算機のキーで戦争行進曲をドラムのように叩き始めるのを見た。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}在痛苦之中，你看到帕斯卡举起手，向他身后的技术神甫示意，开始敲击沉思者的键盘，演奏起战斗进行曲。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Through the pain, you see Pasqal raise his hand, signalling the Tech-Priests behind him, and start drumming a battle march on the cogitator's keys.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}在痛苦之中，你看到帕斯卡举起手，向他身后的技术祭司示意，开始敲击思考器的键盘，演奏起战斗进行曲。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Durch den Schmerz siehst du, wie Pasqal die Hand hebt, ein Zeichen für die Techpriester hinter sich, und auf den Tasten des Cogitators einen Kriegsmarsch zu trommeln beginnt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Through the pain, you see Pasqal raise his hand, signalling the Tech-Priests behind him, and start drumming a battle march on the cogitator's keys.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Durch den Schmerz siehst du, wie Pasqal die Hand hebt, ein Zeichen für die Techpriester hinter sich, und auf den Tasten des Cogitators einen Kriegsmarsch zu trommeln beginnt.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Malgré la douleur, vous voyez que Pasqal fait signe aux technoprêtres derrière lui et commence à marteler furieusement les touches du cogitateur.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Through the pain, you see Pasqal raise his hand, signalling the Tech-Priests behind him, and start drumming a battle march on the cogitator's keys.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Malgré la douleur, vous voyez que Pasqal fait signe aux technoprêtres derrière lui et commence à marteler furieusement les touches du cogitateur.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Con la vista nublada por el dolor, ves que Pasqal levanta la mano para hacer una señal a los tecnosacerdotes que tiene detrás y se pone a tamborilear un himno de batalla en las teclas del cogitador.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Through the pain, you see Pasqal raise his hand, signalling the Tech-Priests behind him, and start drumming a battle march on the cogitator's keys.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Con la vista nublada por el dolor, ves que Pasqal levanta la mano para hacer una señal a los tecnosacerdotes que tiene detrás y se pone a tamborilear un himno de batalla en las teclas del cogitador.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Acılar içinde Pasqal'ın elini kaldırıp arkasındaki Tekno Rahiplere işaret verdiğini görüyorsun. Ardından kavramsayarın tuşlarına öyle bir hızla basıyor ki, sanki öfkesini onlardan çıkarıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Through the pain, you see Pasqal raise his hand, signalling the Tech-Priests behind him, and start drumming a battle march on the cogitator's keys.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Acının arasından Pasqal'ın elini kaldırıp arkasındaki Tekno Rahiplere işaret verdiğini görüyorsun. Ardından kavramsayarın tuşlarına basıyor ve bir savaş marşı yükseliyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
